以下配置仅供参考，你可能需要自行选择需要引用的规则集，并将其与你自己的代理策略匹配。

# Clash
致 Stash 用户：Stash 的规则集配置格式和 Clash **不同**，请继续向下阅读以查看 Stash 规则集的配置方法。

适用于 Clash Meta (Mihomo) 或 Clash Premium **2023.04.13** 及更新的版本：

```yaml
rules:
- RULE-SET,CJMarketing,REJECT
- RULE-SET,Exclude,Final
- RULE-SET,Reject,REJECT
- RULE-SET,WeChat,Proxy
- RULE-SET,CN,DIRECT
- RULE-SET,Microsoft,Proxy
- RULE-SET,niconico,JP
- RULE-SET,BanG Dream,Gaming

rule-providers:
  CJMarketing:
    type: http
    behavior: domain
    format: text
    url: https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/text-plus/cjmarketing.txt
    path: ./rules/cjmarketing.txt
    interval: 86400
  Exclude:
    type: http
    behavior: domain
    format: text
    url: https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/text-plus/exclude.txt
    path: ./rules/exclude.txt
    interval: 86400
  Reject:
    type: http
    behavior: domain
    format: text
    url: https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/text-plus/reject.txt
    path: ./rules/reject.txt
    interval: 86400
  WeChat:
    type: http
    behavior: classical
    url: https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/yaml/wechat.yaml
    path: ./rules/wechat.txt
    interval: 86400
  CN:
    type: http
    behavior: domain
    format: text
    url: https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/text-plus/domestic.txt
    path: ./rules/domestic.txt
    interval: 86400
  Microsoft:
    type: http
    behavior: domain
    format: text
    url: https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/text-plus/microsoft.txt
    path: ./rules/microsoft.txt
    interval: 86400
  niconico:
    type: http
    behavior: domain
    format: text
    url: https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/text-plus/niconico.txt
    path: ./rules/niconico.txt
    interval: 86400
  BanG_Dream:
    type: http
    behavior: domain
    format: text
    url: https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/text-plus/bangdream-jp.txt
    path: ./rules/bangdream-jp.txt
    interval: 86400
```

适用于 Clash Premium **2023.04.13 以前**的版本：

```yaml
rules:
- RULE-SET,CJMarketing,REJECT
- RULE-SET,Exclude,Final
- RULE-SET,Reject,REJECT
- RULE-SET,WeChat,Proxy
- RULE-SET,CN,DIRECT
- RULE-SET,Microsoft,Proxy
- RULE-SET,niconico,JP
- RULE-SET,BanG Dream,Gaming

rule-providers:
  CJMarketing:
    type: http
    behavior: domain
    url: https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/yaml/cjmarketing.yaml
    path: ./rules/cjmarketing.yaml
    interval: 86400
  Exclude:
    type: http
    behavior: domain
    url: https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/yaml/exclude.yaml
    path: ./rules/exclude.yaml
    interval: 86400
  Reject:
    type: http
    behavior: domain
    url: https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/yaml/reject.yaml
    path: ./rules/reject.yaml
    interval: 86400
  WeChat:
    type: http
    behavior: classical
    url: https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/yaml/wechat.yaml
    path: ./rules/wechat.yaml
    interval: 86400
  CN:
    type: http
    behavior: domain
    url: https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/yaml/domestic.yaml
    path: ./rules/domestic.yaml
    interval: 86400
  Microsoft:
    type: http
    behavior: domain
    url: https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/yaml/microsoft.yaml
    path: ./rules/microsoft.yaml
    interval: 86400
  niconico:
    type: http
    behavior: domain
    url: https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/yaml/niconico.yaml
    path: ./rules/niconico.yaml
    interval: 86400
  BanG Dream:
    type: http
    behavior: domain
    url: https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/yaml/bangdream-jp.yaml
    path: ./rules/bangdream-jp.yaml
    interval: 86400
```

# Stash
```yaml
rules:
- RULE-SET,CJMarketing,REJECT
- RULE-SET,Exclude,Final
- RULE-SET,Reject,REJECT
- RULE-SET,WeChat,Proxy
- RULE-SET,CN,DIRECT
- RULE-SET,Microsoft,Proxy
- RULE-SET,niconico,JP
- RULE-SET,BanG Dream,Gaming

rule-providers:
  CJMarketing:
    type: http
    behavior: domain-text
    url: https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/text/cjmarketing.txt
    path: ./rules/cjmarketing.txt
    interval: 86400
  Exclude:
    type: http
    behavior: domain-text
    url: https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/text/exclude.txt
    path: ./rules/exclude.txt
    interval: 86400
  Reject:
    type: http
    behavior: domain-text
    url: https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/text/reject.txt
    path: ./rules/reject.txt
    interval: 86400
  WeChat:
    type: http
    behavior: classical
    url: https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/yaml/wechat.yaml
    path: ./rules/wechat.yaml
    interval: 86400
  CN:
    type: http
    behavior: domain-text
    url: https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/text/domestic.txt
    path: ./rules/domestic.txt
    interval: 86400
  Microsoft:
    type: http
    behavior: domain-text
    url: https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/text/microsoft.txt
    path: ./rules/microsoft.txt
    interval: 86400
  niconico:
    type: http
    behavior: domain-text
    url: https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/text/niconico.txt
    path: ./rules/niconico.txt
    interval: 86400
  BanG_Dream:
    type: http
    behavior: domain-text
    url: https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/text/bangdream-jp.txt
    path: ./rules/bangdream-jp.txt
    interval: 86400
```

# Surge 3+ / Shadowrocket
```
[Rule]
DOMAIN-SET,https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/text/cjmarketing.txt,REJECT
DOMAIN-SET,https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/text/exclude.txt,Final
DOMAIN-SET,https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/text/reject.txt,REJECT
RULE-SET,https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/classical/wechat.txt,proxy
DOMAIN-SET,https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/text/domestic.txt,DIRECT
DOMAIN-SET,https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/text/microsoft.txt,Proxy
DOMAIN-SET,https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/text/niconico.txt,JP
DOMAIN-SET,https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/text/bangdream-jp.txt,Gaming
```

# Quantumult X
该软件需要使用 Quantumult 规则集。

**每个策略组都必须指定 `force-policy` 字段！**

```
[filter_remote]
https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/quantumult/cjmarketing.txt,tag=CJMarketing,force-policy=Reject,enabled=true
https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/quantumult/exclude.txt,tag=Exclude,force-policy=Final,enabled=true
https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/quantumult/reject.txt,tag=Reject,force-policy=Reject,enabled=true
https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/quantumult/wechat.txt,tag=WeChat,force-policy=Proxy,enabled=true
https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/quantumult/domestic.txt,tag=CN,force-policy=Direct,enabled=true
https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/quantumult/microsoft.txt,tag=Microsoft,force-policy=Proxy,enabled=true
https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/quantumult/niconico.txt,tag=niconico,force-policy=JP,enabled=true
https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/quantumult/bangdream-jp.txt,tag=BanG Dream,force-policy=Gaming,enabled=true
```

# Loon
该软件需要使用传统规则集。

```
[Remote Rule]
https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/classical/cjmarketing.txt,policy=REJECT,tag=CJMarketing,enabled=true
https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/classical/exclude.txt,policy=Final,tag=Exclude,enabled=true
https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/classical/reject.txt,policy=REJECT,tag=Reject,enabled=true
https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/classical/wechat.txt,policy=Proxy,tag=WeChat,enabled=true
https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/classical/domestic.txt,policy=DIRECT,tag=CN,enabled=true
https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/classical/microsoft.txt,policy=Proxy,tag=Microsoft,enabled=true
https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/classical/niconico.txt,policy=JP,tag=niconico,enabled=true
https://rules.xkww3n.cyou/classical/bangdream-jp.txt,policy=Gaming,tag=BanG Dream,enabled=true
```
